name: ABBVIE
sampleDescriptions: Legislative services related to H.R. 1, Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to titles II and V of the concurrent resolution on the budget for fiscal year 2018 (bill formerly known as the Tax Cuts and Jobs Act).
Legislative services related to Public Law 115-97 (Tax Cuts and Jobs Act) and tax issues related to Puerto Rico.
Legislative services related to Public Law 115-97 (Tax Cuts and Jobs Act), and tax issues related to Puerto Rico.
Legislative services related to supply chain tax issues.
Legislative services related to changes to international tax provisions.
Legislative services related to changes to corporate international tax provisions.
Legislative services related to changes to corporate and international tax provisions, and H.R. 5376, Bill to provide for reconciliation pursuant to title II of S. Con. Res. 14.
Legislative services related to changes to corporate and international tax matters, H.R. 2617, Consolidated Appropriations Act, 2023.
Legislative services related to corporate and international tax matters and H.R. 7024, Tax Relief for American Families and Workers Act of 2024.
Legislative services related to corporate and international tax matters.
Legislative services related to corporate and international tax matters and P.L. 119-21.
